oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter written to a friend from John Jacob Baggenstoss
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Baggenstoss enlisted in the US Navy at age 17 in 1917. He served on USS New Jersey and USS Delaware and took part in the search for the missing transport USS Cyclops which disappeared in the Bermuda Triangle in March 1918. In his letter he talks about visiting New York and about getting sea sick. He also discusses his pay and events that are going on with friends from home.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
